titleStmt.title: An Electronic Edition of the Mishnah from Maimonides Autograph MS of the Commentary to the Mishnah
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a .

note.p: Published as a sample text for a digital edition of the Mishnah, using Oxygen
From autograph copy of the Commentary of the Mishnah (Bodleian, Pococke 295). Images from .

ab.note: So pointed by transcriber. But based on the image used for transcription, perhaps חָמֳשין
Following Mishnah follows immediately. Commentary appears in the left margin, with an insertion mark here.

w.note: Space for drawing in Maimonides's commentary.

ab.note: Alternatively, last character is ו for יזיקו.

w.note: Space for drawing in Maimonides's commentary.

ab.w:
למא
Words עליו and למאה are rubbed out.

ab.note: Strikethrough repeated in citation in commentary.
